job.name: &JOB_NAME_UID;
job.command:
starver &STAR_VERSION;
echo echo "JOB_NAME_UID: " &JOB_NAME_UID; echo "JOB_INPUT_FILE: " &JOB_INPUT_FILE; echo "OUT_DIR: " &OUT_DIR; echo "STAR_VERSION: " &STAR_VERSION; echo "BFC_OPTIONS: " &BFC_OPTIONS; echo
setenv BFC_INPFILE &JOB_INPUT_FILE; setenv BFC_OPTIONS `echo &BFC_OPTIONS; | sed 's/_/,/g'`
setenv COMMAND "root4star -b -q -l bfc.C(1,1000,"\""${BFC_OPTIONS}"\"","\""${BFC_INPFILE}"\"")"
ls -al .
echo echo "STAR: " $STAR echo "BFC_INPFILE: " $BFC_INPFILE echo "BFC_OPTIONS: " $BFC_OPTIONS echo "SCRATCH: " $SCRATCH echo "pwd: " `pwd` echo "COMMAND: " $COMMAND echo
root4star -b -q -l bfc.C\(1,100000,\"${BFC_OPTIONS}\",\"${BFC_INPFILE}\"\) >& &OUT_DIR;/&JOB_NAME_UID;_bfc.log
mv pythia8.starsim.MuDst.root &JOB_NAME_UID;.MuDst.root rm *.geom.root *.geant.root *.event.root *.hist.root *.tags.root *.runco.root *.minimc.root
echo "End of job: tralala"
